cleaned_text: Looking for more Verified Exporters? Product Details Product Description Company Details About the Company Naturopathy is an art and science of living and healing. It is devoid of any side effects, without using any chemicals or toxins or drugs. Naturopathy makes a man healthy. Thus it is a complete science of medicine. Unlike other systems of medicine here natural resources like air, water, earth, fire are the main resources of treatment. It is often found that nowadays treatment given for one disease gives way to some other ailment due to the side effect of medicine. Naturopathy has in its own a holistic approach. It doesn't treat your disease rather treatment is given to the body's deep root-the cause of the ailment. Seller Contact Details Kanimangalam Have a requirement? Chat with us
